body:
## Expected Behavior
Either reject the command and make RunID required argument,
OR figure out latest / current RunID if RunID is not specified. (preferred option)

## Actual Behavior
Command execute with unclear error message.

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. Start any workflow.
  2. Delete workflow using admin tool: tctl -ns default admin wf delete -w MY_WORKFLOW_ID
Example:
➜  temporal git:(fix_delete_history_branch) ✗ ./tctl --ns default admin wf delete -w hello_world_workflowID
deleting history events for ...
{
  "treeId": "c2b8ce2c-b2af-498b-b392-bedf11566b75",
  "branchId": "af3231f8-6035-42c9-9290-fc1fdc3824b9"
}
Error: delete mutableState row failed
Error Details: operation DeleteWorkflowExecution encounter invalid UUID ""


## Specifications

  - Version:
  - Platform:

comments.body:
Force delete command is now moved to tdbg:
$ ./tdbg workflow delete --wid hello_world_workflowID
Namespace: default WorkflowID: hello_world_workflowID RunID:
Force delete above workflow execution? [y/N]: y
Workflow execution deleted.

title: Admin tool fail to delete workflow without RunID
